021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
023import net.tnemc.core.account.PlayerAccount;
024import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
025import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
026import net.tnemc.core.currency.Denomination;
027import net.tnemc.core.currency.format.FormatRule;
028import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemCurrency;
029import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemDenomination;
030import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
033import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
034
035import java.util.Optional;
036
037public class MaterialRule implements FormatRule {
038
039  @Override
040  public String name() {
041
042    return "material";
043  }
044
045  /**
046   * Determines whether this format rule should be included in the menu. By default, it is set to
047   * true.
048   *
049   * @return true if this format rule should be included in the menu, false otherwise.
050   */
051  @Override
052  public boolean includeInMenu() {
053
054    return false;
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public String format(@Nullable final Account account, final HoldingsEntry entry, final String format) {
059
060    String formatted = format;
061
062
063    final Optional<Currency> currency = entry.currency();
064    if(account != null && account.isPlayer() && currency.isPresent() && currency.get() instanceof ItemCurrency) {
065      final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = PluginCore.server().findPlayer(((PlayerAccount)account).getUUID());
066      if(provider.isPresent()) {
067        for(final Denomination denomination : currency.get().getDenominations().values()) {
068
069          final ItemDenomination denom = (ItemDenomination)denomination;
070          if(formatted.contains(denom.material())) {
071
072            final AbstractItemStack<?> stack = TNECore.instance().denominationToStack(denom);
073            final int count = PluginCore.server().calculations().count((AbstractItemStack<Object>)stack, provider.get().inventory().getInventory(false));
074            formatted = formatted.replace("<" + denom.material() + ">", String.valueOf(count));
075          }
076        }
077      }
078    }
079    return formatted;
080  }
081}
